TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SoapHttpClientProtocol extends System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpWebClientProtocol

summary.span: 指定当使用 SOAP 时客户端代理从其中派生的类。

span.span: Specifies the class client that proxies derive from when using SOAP.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要生成的 XML Web 服务客户端，然后代理派生的类间接或直接从必须为 XML Web 服务创建。If you are building an XML Web service client, then a proxy class that derives indirectly or directly from must be created for the XML Web service. 当 XML Web 服务客户端调用时使用 SOAP 时，代理类必须派生自，它派生。When the XML Web service client calls using SOAP, the proxy class must derive from , which derives from . 反过来，派生。, in turn, derives from . 若要与 XML Web 服务进行通信，创建代理派生的类间接或直接从你想要调用 XML Web 服务。To communicate with an XML Web service, create a proxy class that derives indirectly or directly from for the XML Web service you want to call. 而不是手动创建代理类，使用 Web 服务描述语言工具 (Wsdl.exe) 来创建给定的 XML Web 服务的服务说明的代理类。Instead of creating the proxy class manually, use the Web Services Description Language tool (Wsdl.exe) to create a proxy class for a given XML Web service's service description. 当 SOAP 协议的生成代理类时，同步对 XML Web 服务方法的调用通过方法，而异步调用都是使用方法和方法。When a proxy class is generated for the SOAP protocol, synchronous calls to XML Web service methods are made via the method, whereas asynchronous calls are made using the method and the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是 wsdl.exe 为生成的代理类`Math`XML Web 服务。The following code example is a proxy class generated by Wsdl.exe for the `Math` XML Web service. 代理类派生自，又派生自抽象类。The proxy class derives from , which derives from the abstract class. [!code-cpp[Classic SoapHttpClientProtocol Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapHttpClientProtocol Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic SoapHttpClientProtocol Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapHttpClientProtocol Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic SoapHttpClientProtocol Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapHttpClientProtocol Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例是`Math`XML Web 服务，从其生成前面的代理类。The following code example is the `Math` XML Web service, from which the preceding proxy class was generated. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).

span.span: This type is thread safe.

span.para: 当重写此类时，可以引入在派生类中的方法，它是特定于特定类型的 XML Web 服务。这些方法捕获参数并调用基类来完成与 XML Web 服务进行通信的工作。如果引入的方法是异步的调用方法和方法。如果引入的方法是同步的调用方法。重写构造函数通常设置属性设置为 XML Web 服务方法的 URL。

When you override this class, you can introduce methods in the derived class which are specific to a particular type of XML Web service. The methods capture the parameters and call the base class to do the work of communicating with the XML Web service. If the introduced methods are asynchronous, call the method and the method. If the introduced methods are synchronous, call the method. The overridden constructor typically sets the property to the URL of the XML Web service method.

param.name: methodName
param.span: 正调用 方法的派生类中的 XML Web services 方法的名称。

span.span: The name of the XML Web service method in the derived class that is invoking the method.

param.span: 对象的数组，包含要传递给 XML Web services 的参数。

span.span: An array of objects containing the parameters to pass to the XML Web service.

span.span: The order of the values in the array correspond to the order of the parameters in the calling method of the derived class.

param.name: callback
param.span: 异步调用完成时要调用的委托。

span.span: The delegate to call when the asynchronous invoke is complete.

param.span: 如果 callback 为 ，则不调用委托。

span.span: If callback is , the delegate is not called.

param.name: asyncState
param.span: 调用方提供的额外信息。

span.span: Extra information supplied by the caller.

summary.span: 开始使用 SOAP 异步调用 XML Web services 方法。

span.span: Starts an asynchronous invocation of an XML Web service method using SOAP.

returns.span: ，传递给 方法以从远程方法调用中获取返回值。

span.span: An that is passed to the method to obtain the return values from the remote method call.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，不会调用方法直接，除非您打算重新构建您自己的代理类为 XML Web 服务。Typically, you would not call the method directly, unless you were building your own proxy class for an XML Web service. 从服务说明由 Web 服务描述语言工具 (Wsdl.exe) 生成的代理类公开 XML Web 服务方法为派生自要以同步方式调用 XML Web 服务方法的代理类的名称。A proxy class generated by the Web Services Description Language tool (Wsdl.exe) from a Service Description exposes the XML Web service methods as names derived from the proxy class to call the XML Web service methods synchronously. 若要以异步方式调用 XML Web 服务方法，两个其他的方法已添加到每个 XML Web 服务方法，另一个使用的代理类`Begin`添加到 XML Web 服务方法，另一个使用的名称的前缀`End`添加前缀。To call the XML Web service methods asynchronously, two additional methods are added to the proxy class for each XML Web service method, one with the `Begin` prefix added to the name of the XML Web service method and one with the `End` prefix added. 代理类调用方法以启动对 XML Web 服务方法的异步调用调用。The proxy class calls the method to start an asynchronous invocation call to the XML Web service method. 例如，如果 XML Web 服务公开名为的 XML Web 服务方法`Add`，该代理类包含一个名为方法`BeginAdd`，用于启动对 XML Web 服务方法。For example, if an XML Web service exposes an XML Web service method named `Add`, the proxy class contains a method named `BeginAdd`, for starting an invocation to the XML Web service method. 中的代码`BeginAdd`，调用方法，并将结果放入的预期返回类型`Add`。Within the code for the `BeginAdd`, a call is made to the method and the results are placed into the expected return type for `Add`. `methodName`用于查找的自定义特性可能已添加到方法，如。The `methodName` is used to find the custom attributes which may have been added to the method, such as . 提供有关所需的 SOAP 协议的派生方法的其他信息。 provides additional information about the derived method that is required for the SOAP protocol. `asyncState` 传递到`callback`，并且包含在从返回方法。`asyncState` is passed into `callback` and is included in the that is returned from the method. `asyncState`参数可用于传递异步调用中指定的上下文信息`callback`参数，处理结果的委托。The `asyncState` parameter can be used to pass information about the context of the asynchronous call, specified in the `callback` parameter, to the delegate that handles the result. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是由 Web 服务描述语言工具 (Wsdl.exe) 生成的代理类为`Math`XML Web 服务。The following code example is a proxy class generated by the Web Services Description Language tool (Wsdl.exe) for the `Math` XML Web service. 内`BeginAdd`代理类方法方法从开始到异步调用`Add`XML Web 服务方法。Within the `BeginAdd` method of the proxy class, the method is starting an asynchronous invocation to the `Add` XML Web service method. [!code-cpp[Classic SoapHttpClientProtocol.BeginInvoke Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapHttpClientProtocol.BeginInvoke Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic SoapHttpClientProtocol.BeginInvoke Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapHttpClientProtocol.BeginInvoke Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic SoapHttpClientProtocol.BeginInvoke Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapHttpClientProtocol.BeginInvoke Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例是`Math`XML Web 服务，从其创建上述的代理类。The following code example is the `Math` XML Web service, from which the preceding proxy class was created.

span.span: The request reached the server computer, but was not processed successfully.

exception.span: 请求对对象的当前状态无效。

span.span: The request was not valid for the object's current state.
An error occurred while accessing the network.

summary.span: 动态绑定到 处的发现文档中描述的 XML Web services。

span.span: Dynamically binds to an XML Web service described in the discovery document at .

remarks.format: ## Remarks XML Web 服务客户端可以动态绑定到 XML Web 服务不是在代理类中使用引用方法。An XML Web service client can dynamically bind to an XML Web service other than the one referenced in the proxy class using the method. 通常情况下，属性是指 XML Web 服务的基址。Typically, the property refers to the base address of the XML Web service. 但是，然后再调用方法，并将属性设置为发现文档的 URL。However, before invoking the method, set the property to a URL of a discovery document. 方法尝试进行的代理类中定义的绑定到的发现文档中找到匹配项，然后动态绑定到它。The method attempts to find a match in the discovery document to the binding defined in the proxy class and then dynamically bind to it. 如果成功，后续方法调用将定向到 XML Web 服务发现文档中所述。If successful, subsequent method calls are directed to the XML Web service described in the discovery document. 如果使用 Web 服务描述语言工具 (Wsdl.exe) 生成代理类，该代理类定义由它调用使用的 XML Web 服务方法实现的绑定。If the proxy class is built using the Web Services Description Language tool (Wsdl.exe), the proxy class defines the binding implemented by the XML Web service methods it invokes using the . 当 XML Web 服务实现多个绑定时，Wsdl.exe 创建代理类的每个绑定。When an XML Web service implements multiple bindings, Wsdl.exe creates a proxy class for each binding. 应用于每个代理类是，它定义的绑定和其命名空间的名称。Applied to each proxy class is a that defines the name of the binding and its namespace. 您设置的发现文档属性必须包含对实现相同的绑定名称和命名空间中，XML Web 服务的引用或引发异常。The discovery document you set the property to must contain a reference to an XML Web service that implements the same binding name and namespace, or an exception is thrown. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是使用 Wsdl.exe 实用工具为生成一个代理类`Math`XML Web 服务。The following code example is a proxy class generated using the Wsdl.exe utility for the `Math` XML Web service. 一个应用于`Math`设置为绑定名称的代理类`MathSoap`并为其命名空间`http://tempuri.org/`。A is applied to the `Math` proxy class setting the binding name to `MathSoap` and its namespace to `http://tempuri.org/`. [!code-cpp[SoapHttpClientProtocol.Discover Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapHttpClientProtocol.Discover Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SoapHttpClientProtocol.Discover Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapHttpClientProtocol.Discover Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SoapHttpClientProtocol.Discover Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapHttpClientProtocol.Discover Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例是使用上述的代理类的 Web 服务客户端。The following code example is a Web Service client using the preceding proxy class. 内`EnterBtn_Click`事件的 Web 窗体，XML Web 服务客户端调用方法试图动态绑定到的用户提供的 URL。Within the `EnterBtn_Click` event of the Web Form, the XML Web service client calls the method attempting to dynamically bind to the URL supplied by the user. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-csharp[SoapHttpClientProtocol.Discover Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapHttpClientProtocol.Discover Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[SoapHttpClientProtocol.Discover Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapHttpClientProtocol.Discover Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#2)]

span.span: The proxy class does not have a binding defined.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，不会调用方法直接，除非您打算重新构建您自己的代理类为 XML Web 服务。Typically, you would not call the method directly, unless you were building your own proxy class for an XML Web service. 由 XML Web 服务的 Web 服务描述语言工具 (Wsdl.exe) 生成的代理类公开 XML Web 服务方法，用作从代理类的同步调用 XML Web 服务方法的名称。A proxy class generated by the Web Services Description Language tool (Wsdl.exe) for an XML Web service exposes the XML Web service methods as names off of the proxy class for calling the XML Web service methods synchronously. 用于以异步方式调用 XML Web 服务方法，两种其他方法添加到每个 XML Web 服务方法，另一个使用的代理类`Begin`添加到 XML Web 服务方法，另一个使用的名称的前缀`End`添加前缀。For calling the XML Web service methods asynchronously, two additional methods are added to the proxy class for each XML Web service method, one with the `Begin` prefix added to the name of the XML Web service method and one with the `End` prefix added. 代理类调用方法以完成对 XML Web 服务方法的异步调用调用。The proxy class calls the method to complete an asynchronous invocation call to the XML Web service method. 例如，如果 XML Web 服务公开名为的 XML Web 服务方法`Add`，该代理类包含一个名为方法`EndAdd`，完成异步调用 XML Web 服务方法。For example, if an XML Web service exposes an XML Web service method named `Add`, the proxy class contains a method named `EndAdd`, for completing an asynchronous invocation of an XML Web service method. 中的代码`EndAdd`调用方法，然后将结果放入的预期返回类型`Add`。Within the code for the `EndAdd` a call is made to the method and then the results are placed into the expected return type for `Add`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是 wsdl.exe 为生成的代理类`Math`XML Web 服务。The following code example is a proxy class generated by Wsdl.exe for the `Math` XML Web service. 内`EndAdd`代理类方法方法完成的异步调用`Add`XML Web 服务方法。Within the `EndAdd` method of the proxy class, the method completes the asynchronous invocation to the `Add` XML Web service method. [!code-cpp[Classic SoapHttpClientProtocol.EndInvoke Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapHttpClientProtocol.EndInvoke Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic SoapHttpClientProtocol.EndInvoke Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapHttpClientProtocol.EndInvoke Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic SoapHttpClientProtocol.EndInvoke Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapHttpClientProtocol.EndInvoke Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例是`Math`XML Web 服务，从其创建上述的代理类。The following code example is the `Math` XML Web service, from which the preceding proxy class was created.

span.span: An array of objects that contains the return value and any or parameters of the derived class method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，不调用方法直接，除非正在生成您自己的代理类为 XML Web 服务。Typically, you do not call the method directly, unless you are building your own proxy class for an XML Web service. 由 XML Web 服务的 Web 服务描述语言工具 (Wsdl.exe) 生成的代理类公开 XML Web 服务方法与从代理类的名称。A proxy class generated by the Web Services Description Language tool (Wsdl.exe) for an XML Web service exposes the XML Web service methods as names off of the proxy class. 代理类调用方法来调用 XML Web 服务方法调用。The proxy class calls the method to invoke an XML Web service method call. 例如，如果 XML Web 服务公开名为的 XML Web 服务方法`Add`，该代理类还包含一个名为方法`Add`。For example, if an XML Web service exposes an XML Web service method named `Add`, the proxy class also contains a method named `Add`. 中的代码`Add`方法中的代理类，通过 XML Web 服务方法进行同步调用方法，然后将结果放入的预期返回类型`Add`。Within the code for the `Add` method in the proxy class, a synchronous call is made to the XML Web service method through the method and then the results are placed into the expected return type for `Add`. `methodName`使用参数以查找可能已添加到方法，如自定义属性。The `methodName` parameter is used to find the custom attributes that may have been added to the method, such as . 提供有关所需的 SOAP 协议的派生方法的其他信息。 provides additional information on the derived method which is required for the SOAP protocol. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是 wsdl.exe 为生成的代理类`Math`XML Web 服务。The following code example is a proxy class generated by Wsdl.exe for the `Math` XML Web service. 内`Add`代理类方法方法调用`Add`XML Web 服务方法。Within the `Add` method of the proxy class, the method is calling the `Add` XML Web service method. [!code-cpp[Classic SoapHttpClientProtocol.Invoke Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapHttpClientProtocol.Invoke Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic SoapHttpClientProtocol.Invoke Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapHttpClientProtocol.Invoke Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic SoapHttpClientProtocol.Invoke Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic SoapHttpClientProtocol.Invoke Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例是`Math`XML Web 服务，从其创建上述的代理类。The following code example is the `Math` XML Web service, from which the preceding proxy class was created.

exception.span: 请求到达了服务器计算机，但未被成功处理。

span.span: The request reached the server computer, but was not processed successfully.

exception.span: 请求对对象的当前状态无效。

span.span: The request was not valid for the object's current state.
An error occurred while accessing the network.
Invokes the specified method asynchronously.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapProtocolVersion SoapVersion { get; set; }
.property instance valuetype System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapProtocolVersion SoapVersion
Public Property SoapVersion As SoapProtocolVersion

public: property System::Web::Services::Protocols::SoapProtocolVersion SoapVersion { System::Web::Services::Protocols::SoapProtocolVersion get(); void set(System::Web::Services::Protocols::SoapProtocolVersion value); };
member this.SoapVersion : System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapProtocolVersion with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置用于对 XML Web services 修改的 SOAP 请求的 SOAP 协议版本。

span.span: Gets or sets the version of the SOAP protocol used to make the SOAP request to the XML Web service.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性设置到由 Web 服务描述语言工具 (Wsdl.exe) 生成的代理类中默认情况下，当 XML Web 服务的 WSDL 文档支持 SOAP 1.1 版。The property is set in the proxy class generated by the Web Services Description Language tool (Wsdl.exe) to by default when a WSDL document for an XML Web service supports SOAP version 1.1. 但是，当 XML Web services 仅支持 SOAP 1.2，Wsdl.exe 集属性设置为。However, when an XML Web service only supports SOAP 1.2, Wsdl.exe sets the property to . 若要生成使用 Wsdl.exe 的代理类时，请选择 SOAP 协议的版本，请使用`/protocol`开关与`SOAP`或`SOAP12`设置，以设置属性设置为和分别.To choose the version of the SOAP protocol when generating the proxy class with Wsdl.exe, use the `/protocol` switch with the `SOAP` or `SOAP12` settings to set the property to and , respectively. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置用来与 SOAP 1.2 的 XML Web 服务进行通信的协议的版本。The following code example sets the version of the protocol used to communicate with an XML Web service to SOAP 1.2. [!code-aspx-csharp[SoapHttpClientProtocol.SoapVersion#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapHttpClientProtocol.SoapVersion/CS/serverusageclientcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[SoapHttpClientProtocol.SoapVersion#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapHttpClientProtocol.SoapVersion/VB/serverusageclientvb.aspx#1)]
